title: party for 1
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I'm home alone, it's just me
It's 1 a.m., I can't sleep
Checked my phone again
You're not answering
You're at some party downtown
Drinking your frat boy heart out
With all your school friends
Wasn't invited
[Pre-Chorus]
But go and have fun on your own with all those girls you barely know
And I'll be waiting here at home (Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah)
Your ignorance is mixed with Fireball and wondering why you try at all
Maybe I'm better off alone
[Chorus]
Just call me when you're sober
Call me when it's over
Call me slurring over your words from a payphone
Yeah, call me with an address
So I can clean up your mеss
I'm far too in love to ever lеt you hear the tone
And I'm all about having fun
But this is a party for one

[Verse 2]
It's 3 a.m., still no call
I'd go to sleep but I'm so
Angry at you, dear
I wish you were here
And then I'd get to thinking
With you and all that drinking
What if you got hurt?
Expecting the worst
[Pre-Chorus]
Don't understand how it's so hard to call me once while at the bar
Do you not care about my care for you? (Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah-ah)
Oh, 'cause it's so easy to ease my mind, but it cuts into your party time
Was I wrong to ever trust you?
[Chorus]
Just call me when you're sober
Call me when it's over
Call me slurring over your words from a payphone
Yeah, call me with an address
So I can clean up your mess
I'm far too in love to ever let you hear the tone
And I'm all about having fun
But this is a party for one
